display_long_description:
Whitewater VR - Extreme Kayaking Adventure is an immersive kayaking simulation game that places players in the heart of exciting and challenging river courses. You will learn the basics of extreme kayaking, navigate through different river environments, and experience the thrill of whitewater rapids from the comfort of your home.

Get ready to paddle through some of the world's wildest, and most challenging rapids in breathtaking VR. With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and heart-pumping action, you'll race against the clock as you navigate through wild waters filled with obstacles and surprises.

- Experience the rush of whitewater kayaking in breathtaking VR
- Navigate through stunning scenery and dodge obstacles
- Beat your friends with online leaderboards

Do you have what it takes to become a master of the river?
Find out in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!

**Features:**

- Immersive VR adventure
- Physics-based kayaking experience
- 5 beautiful hand crafted, photorealistic locations to explore
- Realistic water simulation
- Race against the clock and conquer the elements in each unique environment.
